backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining profiles, likes, matches, chat messages, filters, and related comparison logic, plus CRUD-like operations with access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a frontend reliability fix to specific files, components, and tests with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of summarized descriptions for all major frontend files involved in the PadelMatch app.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_MAINNET.md: Mainnet deployment guide explaining prerequisites and steps for deploying the app on IC.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with PWA configuration, meta tags, and notes for production service worker/manifest setup.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theming, icons, and display mode for PadelMatch.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Versioned production service worker implementing precaching, cache cleanup, and network-first/static cache-first fetch strategies.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, profile loading, and conditional routing to login, setup, or main app shell.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Main app layout managing screen navigation and chat state, rendering screens and a bottom navigation bar.
frontend/src/components/ChatMessageBubbl: Renders a message bubble with styling based on sender and formatted timestamp.
frontend/src/components/DiscoverCard.tsx: Displays a detailed profile card with photo, stats, level, tags, and bio for discovery.
Provides UI controls to filter discovery results by level range and zone.
frontend/src/components/LevelStars.tsx: Shows up to five stars based on a user's level using mapped numeric values.
frontend/src/components/ProfilePhotoUplo: Handles image selection and upload with size/type validation and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/UserAvatar.tsx: Displays a user's photo if available or a placeholder avatar if not.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context for Internet Identity, managing login, stored identities, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for profiles, photos, discovery, and interactions using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/screens/ChatScreen.tsx: Chat UI that loads messages and recipient profile, handles sending messages, and displays a scrollable chat view.
frontend/src/screens/DiscoverScreen.tsx: Candidate discovery screen with filters, swipe-like like/pass actions, and dynamic candidate loading.
frontend/src/screens/EditProfileScreen.t: Form for editing user profile fields and submitting updates through a mutation.
frontend/src/screens/LoginScreen.tsx: Login screen using Internet Identity with branding, tagline, and login button.
frontend/src/screens/MatchesScreen.tsx: Displays user matches and loads profile cards, allowing navigation to chat for each match.
frontend/src/screens/ProfileScreen.tsx: User profile screen that loads the caller's profile, displays details with edit and photo upload options, and shows an edit form when toggled.
Profile creation form that collects user info and submits it via useCreateProfile, including availability parsing and basic validation.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsScreen.tsx: Settings page providing logout functionality via Internet Identity and showing basic app info.
frontend/src/utils/profileMappings.ts: Utility functions converting between Level enums and numbers plus mapping Position enums to Spanish labels.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query strings.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current issues, features, and a pending request related to profile visibility for matched users.
